name: btlike BT搜索引擎
body:
### 组件
- [crawl](https://github.com/btlike/crawl) 从DHT网络中抓取活跃的infohash
- [storage](https://github.com/btlike/storage) 根据infohash从网络中抓取torrent并存储metadata
- [api](https://github.com/btlike/api) 对外提供接口，响应搜索等请求
- [site](https://github.com/btlike/site) web网站

### 安装准备
- 安装golang
- 安装mysql
- 安装[elasticsearch](https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch)

### 安装组件
crawl `go get github.com/btlike/crawl`
api `go get github.com/btlike/api`
storage `go get github.com/btlike/storage`
site `git clone https://github.com/btlike/site.git`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
